org.elasticsearch.common.text

Class BytesText

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.text.BytesText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Text>, Text

    public class BytesText
extends Object
implements Text
    A BytesReference representation of the text, will always convert on the fly to a String.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
